titleStmt.title: The first part of the Mirrour of princely deedes and knighthood vvherin is shevved the worthinesse of the Knight of the Sunne, and his brother Rosicleer, sonnes to the great Emperour Trebatio, with the straunge loue of the beautifull Princesse Briana, [and] the valiant actes of other noble princes and knights. Now newly translated out of Spanish into our vulgar English tongue, by M.T.
Espejo de principes y cavalleros. Part 1. Book 1. English.
titleStmt.author: Ortúñez de Calahorra, Diego. aut
Tyler, Margaret, fl. 1580.

notesStmt.note: A translation of book 1 of part 1 of "Espejo de principes y cavalleros", written by Diego Ortúñez de Calahorra. There are two further books of part 1 (STC 18862-5), and three further parts by other authors (STC 18866-71).
Running title reads: The first part of the mirrour of knighthood.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
